DOC.brief_summary: To assess the efficacy of inhaled AIR645 in the suppression of the Asthmatic Responses in subjects with mild asthma inhaling an allergen.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Effects of AIR645 on Allergen-Induced Airway Responses in Subjects With Mild Atopic Asthma
DOC.criteria: Men and women with well controlled mild allergic asthma, aged 18 to 65 years Only asthma med is shortacting bronchodilator used not more than twice weekly FEV1 greater than 70% predicted and a demonstrated baseline late response to allergen induction
